name: phase-skip
description: Phase 2 manually set to Done - verifies skipping phases works correctly

parent_issue.title: Multi-phase with phase skip
parent_issue.body:
## Description

A multi-phase feature where phase 2 will be manually skipped.

## Requirements

- Phase 1: Setup
- Phase 2: SKIPPED (manually set to Done)
- Phase 3: Final implementation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Phase 1 completes
- [ ] Phase 2 is skipped
- [ ] Phase 3 completes

sub_issues.title: Phase 1: Setup
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Create initial structure

## Testing

- [ ] Setup validates

sub_issues.title: Phase 2: SKIP THIS
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [x] This phase is skipped

## Testing

- [x] N/A - skipped

sub_issues.title: Phase 3: Final
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Implement final feature

## Testing

- [ ] Final tests pass
